response.original_title: Dickie Smalls: From Shame to Fame
response.overview: Derrick, a bastard, is about to become a father and begins to document his feelings on tape. Unfortunate for him, Perry, his lovably sadistic friend, convinces him they should make a documentary searching for his father. Fortunate for one of them it could be a ONE INCH penis having ex-porn star from the eighties.
response.title: Dickie Smalls: From Shame to Fame
